greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into unitary divisors of n.
link: David A. Corneth, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001 (first 329 terms by Antti Karttunen)
program: partitions_into(n,parts,from=1) = if(!n,1,my(k = #parts, s=0); for(i=from,k,if(parts[i]<=n, s += partitions_into(n-parts[i],parts,i))); (s));
(PARI) See Corneth link. \\ _David A. Corneth_, Aug 12 2018
results.author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Jan 26 2002
